page.title: 11Crichton Castle
page.content: Crichton castle is a spectacular old 14th century fortification,built on a hill over looking Crichton Glen.It is now a ruin owned by the National Trust.It is kept beautifully and visited reguarly by tourists. It began as a tower house in the 14th century and was enlarged gradually as the Crichton family, became more influential in Scottish affairs.The family lands and castle were forfieted in 1483 for treason. Crichton Castle has a long list of owners since.Many famous people have stayed there including Mary Queen of Scots. It was laid to siege and finally taken by Cromwell in the Covenanters War.Now it is a National monument.
